name: Miburi & Teburi
overview: Miburi & Teburi (ミブリー＆テブリー), players will follow the cute wayward girl "Mim Puli" and the boy "Tipley" who is running around with "Mop Puli" to swim the "Question Sea", challenge various topics and reclaim the secret treasure "authentic" from the pirates. Players also need to create a new route through the "word exchange chain" to find out the hidden entrance to break the level.
